content: परि(री)भवः {@--1@} Insult, injury, humiliation, disrespect, degradation, disgrace; पराक्रमः परिभवे वैयात्यं सुरतेष्विव (भूषणं) <ls>Śi. 2. 44</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 37</ls>; <ls>Ve. 1. 25</ls>; <ls>U. 4. 23</ls>; <ls>Mu. 3. 4</ls>; <ls>Mv. 1. 40</ls>, <ls n="Mv.">3. 17.</ls> {@--2@} Defeat, discomfiture.
